response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,200,000, but I understand its importance to you might be even greater at $1,000,000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and providing you with a competitive advantage. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
